name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care (Ci Yuan)
display_name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care

reviews.author: Windmill Empower
reviews.review_text:
弄墨轩 Ink Splashing Calligraphy and Painting Society was invited to share CNY calligraphy and paintings with the clients at this Centre.

We are touched by Center Manager Mr Alan Lim enthusiasm, spontaneous spirit & loving thoughts to bring CNY festive cheers to the senior clients.

弄墨轩 Led by Master Lee Fook Kwang 李福光会长 and his Calligraphists  members, the graceful writing & happy dragon paintings  put smiles for over 350+ clients. Sending    love, respect and good health wishes to the beloved Seniors at Ci Yuan Centre.

reviews.author: Drew
reviews.review_text:
My parent who had a neurodegenerative disease (limited cognition, communication, mobility) received excellent care here at Ciyuan Care Centre.

Environment is alright (definitely not bleak). The staff are caring (very attentive to medical issues) and alert the family of any issues. Programs and activities are suited for my parent.

Thankful location is convenient for my family. My family isn't well-off but this place exceeded our expectations.

reviews.author: Perry
reviews.review_text:
16Aug23 I placed my elderly mother on the NTUC Functional Strength Training waitlist, which has an estimated 6 months wait or longer. In September I chased again to no avail, but I showed my eagerness to get my mum on the programme. Fast forward to Jan24, I was told the wait is 8-10 months more.

I feel I wasted 6 months waiting. No explanation other than "no manpower", which is disappointing.

reviews.author: Xu Ruby
reviews.review_text:
My grandma has been going to Ci Yuan Senior Day Care for about 3 months and is enjoying herself there. The daily social activities and exercises held at the centre surely helps in maintaining her mental and physical health.
The community nurses are prompt in updating and following up on any concerns raised. Really glad and thankful for their care and concern towards my grandma and for the open communication channel.
Thank you so much to the Ci Yuan team! 😊❤️

reviews.author: Preston Samuel
reviews.review_text: My dad have been going for his day care @ NTUC Ci - Yuan CC for about 5-6 years. The family have seen tremendous progress in my dad . In terms of physical,  emotionally and mentally. He had many opportunity given to him eg. Took part in community events, inter collaborative events . The team in Ci-Yuan Cc is supportive and engaging with my dad . He comes back always with a smile and light heartedness.  We believe they played a big part of my dads life. I would definitely recommend to anyone who is finding a place to sent your love ones.

description:
- Dementia Day Care supports mental abilities and memory recall.  
- Activities include reminiscence therapy and music therapy.  
- Focus on socialization and daily living assistance.

name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care (Serangoon Central)
display_name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Serangoon Central (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care)

reviews.author: Zi Heng Wong
reviews.review_text: I have been at NTUC Health Serangoon Central Day Rehab Centre since 2014. They are equipped with a comprehensive range of equipment and facilities which they regularly review so as to remain relevant with the latest technology to best support the range of clients they serve. The staff have been dedicated and demonstrated genuine care and concern to each client beyond just providing therapy services. This personal touch and approach fostered a positive environment which goes beyond just physical aspects, but also mental and social domains which can contribute to much positive outcomes. Overall, a commendable rehabilitation centre that I would recommend.

reviews.author: Carolyn Lee
reviews.review_text:
Thank you, NTUC Team!
A shout-out for all their good work and care.

Thank you, Lilian and Nurse Chong and team...
I really appreciate the professionalism and care and understanding given by the team.
My father wants to thank Rose who is very attentive to him and he feels very loved at the Centre.

I love the updates given by the team too.
It really helps me in my communication with the team.

Although my father is not able to attend the Day Care Centre.
I am looking forward to helping my father to enrol in the Day Care Plus.

Many thanks again, Team!!!!
You have excelled in every way to give my father support, care and encouragement.
And helped my family in journeying together with us.

We wish you all the best and to shine on in our community.

reviews.author: J Tan
reviews.review_text: My mother, who has dementia, attends this daycare centre. I am very grateful for how the daycare staff care for my mom, taking a load off my mind. For example, Claris, who currently serves as the bus escort in the morning, was extremely patient and gentle when my mom forgot where she put her house keys. My thank you's to the daycare staff are not enough to express my gratitude.

reviews.author: Cheow Fong Pang
reviews.review_text: It is never easy taking care of someone and let alone a group of unique individuals in their golden years. Really appreciate the tireless effort, patience, care and passion from the team at the centre in doing such a wonderful job! While taking care of my mother's needs, they also try to find out her interests and constantly engaging her in conversations and various activities. This reflects in her eagerness to go to the centre everyday, always coming home cheery and proud of her own achievements with little pretty artworks. Special thanks to Nurse Chong, Nurse Aide Kathlene, Auntie Winnie, Uncle Lee and Centre Manager Lilian! I am truly inspired and encouraged to also continue my own effort in taking care of my parents.

reviews.author: WENDY KOH
reviews.review_text: My mother has been with NTUC Health GymTonic/Circuit Training Gym since 2019. She enjoys going there for her exercises twice a week. The many exercise stations suit her needs in strengthening her body. The physiotherapists are all very friendly and patient with the old folks. She has made many new friends there at the gym and loves going there to chitchat with them. A good gym for the old folks! Special thanks to the staffs: Sharon, Pearl, Jia Wei, and Colleen. Very patient, approachable and professional in handling members' appointments and queries. Very good experience!

description:
- Dementia Day Care offers structured support and activities.  
- Specialized care for Alzheimer’s and cognitive conditions.  
- Activities include reminiscence and music therapy sessions.

name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care (Toa Payoh)
display_name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Toa Payoh (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care)

reviews.author: huikheng chng
reviews.review_text: Very happy my mother attended senior day care at NTUC Toa Payoh. She always look forward to the sessions and comes home cheerful, sometimes showing off the handicraft work done at the centre or small prizes won during games. Today, she even had her hair cut by a volunteer at the centre! The staff are excellent, always trying their best to engage the clients during activities. Special thanks to Penny, Mr Wong, supervisor Ivan, and centre manager Yoke Cheng.

reviews.author: Lim Sok Hoon
reviews.review_text: My dad has dementia and thanks to the centre, it has given him much joy and entertainment such as games, interactive group activities that keep him engaged and helped improve his well being. Would definitely recommend this centre to similar needs silver folks. Special thanks to Ms Yoke Cheng for close communication with me on schedules, listening to my special requests and she has never say no and always there when I needed help. Special thanks to all the centre team members for being so attentive and caring to my dad on hygiene, health observation etc.. So thankful.

reviews.author: Leanne Yap
reviews.review_text: My father in law has dementia and attended the care centre daily for several years.  The centre manager Ms Yoke Cheng and her team in particular the supervisor Mr Ivaane, Nurse Natasha, Nursing aides Charmaine and Karen, are in close communication with us, always helpful with his diet, medication and fluid restriction, observant about his health, motor skills and wounds.  They are very patient and treat the elderly with respect and care.  My father in law has enjoyed the activities especially the mahjong games in the centre. We are thankful for their support and kindness.

reviews.author: Choy Fen Chan
reviews.review_text:
I am glad my mum landed in NTUC Health Senior Day care Toa Payoh since she is diagnosed with mild dementia in 2016.

I have seen the changes that NTUC and the management have made and transformed the center environment to be a very conducive environment from then to now.

The staff are patient and I would like to mention a few of them who I have interaction with. The “am escort”, Uncle Basari, he’s always jovial and doing the extra miles in many occasions. 1 is reminding me to give my mum medication before he fetches her in the morning. And making sure she’s safe while moving her from my house to the center

The other is Penny, she’s super patient and gets along well with my mum. She helps to clean n change her when my mum has loose stools or mild diarrhoea. And never have I heard that she complained about such cuz the stools could be very “stink” and sores panty.

Yoke Cheng, thanks for reacting to  the finance and billing quickly. This really helps.
Discharging her from daycare is my last resort but I definitely miss the warmth and patience of each and everyone

reviews.author: Jean Yee
reviews.review_text: My mom has been with NTUC Health Senior Daycare for many years. We're pleased with the care, facilities, engaging activities and programs of the centre she attends. The management and staff are patient, take good care of my mom and always keep us posted during this pandemic. We are appreciative of Ivan and Yoke Ching, in particular, for their service and attention to details when attending to the elderly in the centre.

description:
- Dementia Day Care supports memory and cognitive abilities.  
- Offers structured programmes and meaningful activities.  
- Provides specialized care for Alzheimer’s and dementia patients.

name: Care Corner Senior Care Centre (Toa Payoh East)
display_name: Care Corner Senior Care Centre (Toa Payoh East)

reviews.author: Jacqueline Heng
reviews.review_text: My 85 years old aunt who has dementia has been going to Care Corner (Toa Payoh East) since Nov 2023. While her condition cannot be reversed, my aunt is now more alert and in better spirits. Many thanks to the team for organizing various activities to keep her engaged. I appreciate Claudine's regular update to me on my aunt's progress. Knowing that there is this care and support system for my aunt gives me a peace of mind. I am grateful to the team for this. Please continue your good work!

reviews.author: Chan Wing Yin
reviews.review_text:
My mom(Mdm Loh Inn Hong) almost 100 years old has been attending the senior care centre at Toa Payoh East since Oct 22. So far, she feels comfortable at the centre. The dedicated team led by Ms Claudine provides simple therapies, games n meaningful activities for my mom. This has made her  stay active in the morning n to a certain extent has improved her mental health.
I like to thank all the staff for their commitment n outstanding service to my mom n all seniors at the centre. Worthy to mention is Ms Claudine has demonstrated her extra commitment n beyond her call of duty by asking her son n daughter to double up as "Santa Claus" n "God of fortune " during Christmas n CNY celebrations. In my opinion,  Ms Claudine is an asset to the Toa Payoh East Centre. I will continue to let my mom to  attend the centre.

reviews.author: Sydney Alexandria
reviews.review_text: My father has been attending Care Corner for close to 1.5 years at Toa Payoh East 261A. It has been an amazing experience with the dedicated team and volunteers here. Shoutout to Claudine, Shirley, Fathima, Elise, Kevin, Jewel and Henry who have interacted in one way or another with my father and made his time at Care Corner very enjoyable. Also kudos to Vani (physiotherapist) and Jimmy (manager who has left). The team always works hard to conduct games and exercises that the seniors enjoy. I’m so thankful for their conversations and care provided to my father, and their continuous interest to assist my father in aging gracefully. I hope that my father can continue attending Care Corner at TPE261A for a long time to come.

reviews.author: shirley tan
reviews.review_text:
My Mum is one of their clients. She wants me to highlight the exceptional services and care rendered by Ms Lyn Lim and her Team.  She enjoys their activities especially the weekly  Bingo games

The following 2 always go out of their way to make sure she is comfortable
1) Tan Seok Kheng-Tea lady
2) Tay Yong Sing -Male Care Staff

We are thankful for the Team who make my Mum's stay with them an enjoyable one and we will continue sending her there 😁

name: Fu Hui Golden Care Centre
display_name: Grace Lodge (Located inside Fu Hui Link福慧林)

reviews.author: Calvin Ng
reviews.review_text: My mother Tan Keng Ann is a resident of Grace Lodge Nursing Home, is a Nursing Home with very good and caring Staff Nurses and Nurses, they really put in great efforts in taking good care of the elderly residents, a nursing home with a heart, Millions thanks to all Staff Nurses and Nurses of Sunshine Ward 6 of Grace Lodge ❤️

reviews.author: Kt Tay
reviews.review_text: Nice place for taking vegetablian food, delicious and cheap.

reviews.author: Jan Hi
reviews.review_text: There are 2 occasions recently that the order taking lady did not want to take our orders just because there were too many orders in front of us. we reached there at 5.20pm that was before the cut off time 5.45pm according to the order taking lady. Waste our trip there as we are not staying nearby and need to rush for my child tuition at 6pm. We are very disappointed with this kind of service as they are not compassionate towards people who are vegetarian.  Not easy to find pure vegetarian food in such a rush. We dare not go there anymore as we scare of being rejected  as we are unable to know whether they have many orders in front of us. We hope that they can extent their hour to 8pm in order to promote and encourage more people to go vegetarian. 阿弥陀佛。

reviews.author: Leong Ming Poh
reviews.review_text: Went there several times for its vegetarian meals. Surprisingly attracted quite an amount of people, especially during 1st and 15th of the lunar month. The food is great but the queue system doesn't seem to be very efficient and in turn affected their own service attitude.

reviews.author: Jerry QUEK Cheng Pang
reviews.review_text:
A quiet and  peaceful place to have a cup of tea or  coffee and also good vegetarian food in an air condition canteen with a television switch on. Parking fee is not high, the canteen is at level 2 and very near the lift. The canteen opens from 7.30 am to 7.30 pm from Monday  to Saturday,close on Sunday.

reviews.author: Alex Lim
reviews.review_text: May Wong  Daycare has been a wonderful support to our family in taking care of our mum. It was especially important during our father’s passing and the days following because we didn’t want mum to be alone at home. The companionship of others and the care carried us through difficult moments. Kudos to the staff and Lynn, the manager at the center

reviews.author: Jasmine Yeo
reviews.review_text: My mum started daycare a few months ago. She was reluctant to go there at first. However, after a few days, she grew a liking to and really loved to go to the daycare. The manager Ms. Lynn and the staff are very professional and hardworking. My mum's experiences with the daycare have been great! Thank you May Wong Day Care!

reviews.author: Wei Ling Tang
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Lynn and her dedicated team, my mum has been well-cared for since joining the centre about a month ago. She enjoys the programme and mealtime is of very good quality. I am very appreciative of the hard work and dedication by the team especially in keeping the seniors safe amidst this Covid-19 pandemic. Kudos to Lynn and all the dedicated staff!

reviews.author: Peg Ang
reviews.review_text: Thank you Ms Lynn and her dedicated team at May Wong NTUC Day Care for providing care to my elder sister and the Clients at the centre.  With Ms Lynn providing her Leadership , she has managed the team very well in giving their quality service to the Clients. During the past year, the team has taken on greater responsibility in managing covid 19 issues and also to cope with the centre undergoing renovations - a very heavy responsibility to keep the Clients safe and co-ordination during the renovation works.  There are interactions and engagements with Clients' family to update on observations of Clients - these are very key to family members as it enable us to pay attention to their behaviourable and well being. We sincerely thank and  greatly appreciate Ms Lynn and her team for their care and love to the Clients.

reviews.author: Jacinta Lim
reviews.review_text: I would like to say a big thank you to Lynn and her staff of May Wong Daycare for taking care of my mum when she was there.  They were friendly, helpful and would not hesitate to offer their assistance when needed. Keep up the good work!

reviews.review_text: My father has seen great improvement, esp cognitively after attending the eldercare centre. Staff are dedicated and patient with old folks. My father looks forward to attending the centre. Two thumbs up!

reviews.author: wee prue
reviews.review_text:
Staff at the centre were friendly and helpful. They would always greet my dad with a smile and call his name.
The nurses would also call to check on my dad's condition if he is on home leave or has medical appointments.

reviews.author: Peggy Koh
reviews.review_text: The centre staff are friendly and kind. The services and activities are suitable for the elderly.  The centre manager follows up on queries and comments promptly.  Thank you for the labour of love.

reviews.author: Sook Leng Sito
reviews.review_text: Very thankful to have very friendly and heart warming staffs at the centre. They are all very patient and treated my Mother with care! Thumbs up!

reviews.author: Ah Suan Yap
reviews.review_text: The staff are very caring and patient towards the seniors. They really take good care of them. Clean environment. The seniors look happy to be there.

reviews.author: Jaron Yang
reviews.review_text: The staff here are the best! They are so patient and attentive. To all the staff of SANH, thank you so much for taking such good care of my mother for the last one year. My family and I really appreciate all the hard work you have put in to care for my mother and the rest of the old folks here. We know she will continue to be well taken care of!

reviews.author: Mervyn Koh
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing.  The nurses and helpers and doctors attentive and very caring towards to needs of patients.  They know more about the patients than the family members. I am.grateful for their help, care and support towards my dad who is residing there.

reviews.author: Wong Agnes
reviews.review_text: My husband, Mr Lim ST stayed at this nursing home for 7 years. I'm very grateful for all level 3 staffs for their patience and understanding towards my husband and us. He is under good care from medical and nursing team. Thank you for all the hardworks.

reviews.author: mustdoitnow
reviews.review_text: Thank you very much to all the staff of level 7 for the excellent care and attention given to my mom for over 2yrs now. I must add that the manageress, soo ying is very skilful in coordinaring all the staff nurses in performing their duties! Keep up the Good Work 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

reviews.author: Tan Leejee
reviews.review_text: My mother TAN KE came to this nursing home since Jan 2018. Thank you very much all the nurses at level 3 for taking good care of my mother. Your patience, understanding, compassion to all the elderly's are very much appreciated. Thank you SANHQ management for the job well done.

reviews.author: nasf arahim
reviews.review_text: Staff are friendly and always do their duty diligently and helpfuk when needed,shuld gave them some increment and incentive from the management as this place has a good leadership.

reviews.author: Azs Elchinos (Pi Tom)
reviews.review_text: The place look so nice the surrounding is green and the people who work there is very helpful but your front counter could use more time outside rather then we must wait for them to go out some of them they see people outside but still talking to other people inside....

reviews.author: Nora shidah莊若拉識達
reviews.review_text: Outstanding service rendered by all the staff in Senior Care Center. My aunties MAZxxx & Fatxxxx loves this center so much!  The staff is very friendly & compassionate! Wonderful activities too! Well planned! Well communicated on the bills too! Kudos!👏🏻👏🏻

reviews.author: Kenneth Ong
reviews.review_text: A professional care centre for senior citizens who need daily care and other education for them.

reviews.author: Kw Siew
reviews.review_text: I  was visiting yesterday evening and met with the most rude security staff who was manning registrations. He suggested that I go ahead to share my bad experience and even posed for photo, short of announcing his name. I arrived at 7.48pm and was told the place is closed. I noted it says 8pm on the website. I then explained that I did not know the closing time is 7.45pm and ask if he can make an exception as I drive 45 minutes to be there to drop off something, if visit is no-go. Instead of explaining, he rudely challenged me to share this as he claims the management told me to do so. Sigh!

reviews.review_text: A great nursing home with friendly staff and dementia care! Facilities are new and the place is modern.

reviews.author: DN
reviews.review_text:
Excellent reception service but the Home Care clothes for the residents are unacceptable. 9 out of 10 outfits are all torn or broken. Lack of buttons and exposing my mother in law's chest, arms or buttocks etc. Everyday her outfit is torn somewhere. I had no choice but to bring home clothes for her now. Ive informed the nurses many times and they said they have sent feedback to the management many times but still nothing is done.
Poor management!! I hope they protect every residents decency and treat them with respect.

reviews.author: xvir9o
reviews.review_text: Place has not officially open yet however, when entering premises security guard was alert in noticing visitora and helpful in giving information.

display_name: Care Corner Senior Care Centre (Toa Payoh West)

reviews.author: Teo Rachel
reviews.review_text:
My mum and I would like to pen this Appreciation Note to you and your staff.

As I am serving my notice at work and being the only child, it has been comforting that for the past 3 weeks, your staff has helped my mum cross over to the opposite road for her to catch the bus home.

Appreciated much the act of kindness from your staff.

reviews.author: Edna Yeo
reviews.review_text: Dad has been attending Care Corner rehab and day care services for several years now. He always looks forward to the warm greetings and familiar faces of the dedicated staff, whom he knows not just by sight, but by name and even a bit of their personal stories. It's truly heartwarming to witness the bond he has formed with them over time, a testament to the caring and supportive environment they have cultivated. Dad's enthusiasm for these visits speaks volumes about the positive impact they have on his well-being and sense of belonging. He often shares stories about his interactions with the staff, highlighting the kindness and compassion they consistently demonstrate. In many ways, Care Corner has become a second home for Dad, a place where he feels welcomed, understood, and valued. We are immensely grateful for the unwavering support and care he receives from the entire team. Thank you!

reviews.author: Mary Wee
reviews.review_text: Fun, engaging senior care centre

reviews.author: erika :D
reviews.review_text: Are you open on public holidays?

name: Senior Care Centre @ Sunlove Central
display_name: Sunlove Abode For Intellectually Infirmed Ltd

reviews.author: Alexander Jameouson Tan (Toshiro)
reviews.review_text: I had a deeply concerning experience with the staff member named Carlman cafino nicoyco during my time at Sunlove Nursing Home. I observed inappropriate behavior towards new female staff members, including pressuring them for inappropriate actions. Furthermore, during visits, I noticed him making unwelcome advances towards female visitors, invading their personal space, and attempting to obtain their contact information without consent. Such behavior is entirely unacceptable and goes against the standards of professionalism and care that one would expect from a nursing home. Immediate action should be taken to address these issues and ensure the safety and well-being of residents, staff, and visitors.

reviews.author: Aiza Tan
reviews.review_text:
During my stay at Sunlove Nursing Home, I encountered disconcerting behavior exhibited by an individual on the staff roster, who goes by the name of Carlman. I personally witnessed instances of inappropriate conduct directed towards recently employed female staff members. This included the exertion of undue pressure for actions that are unequivocally considered unacceptable within a professional healthcare setting.

Furthermore, during visitation hours, I observed Mr. Carlman engaging in unwelcome advances towards female visitors. This behavior involved an invasion of their personal space and attempts to solicit their contact information without their explicit consent. Such actions stand in stark contrast to the established norms of professionalism and care that one rightfully expects from a nursing home facility.

In light of these observations, it is my strong belief that immediate and thorough action is imperative to address these matters. Such actions are necessary to safeguard the welfare and security of the residents, staff, and visiting individuals associated with Sunlove Nursing Home.

reviews.author: megan
reviews.review_text: my friend had an absolutely terrible experience at Sunlove Nursing Home, largely due to the staff member EN Carlman. His behavior was appalling – he was consistently rude and disrespectful. I observed him blatantly checking out girls and attempting to give them his phone number, which is completely inappropriate and unprofessional. My stay was completely ruined by his behavior.

reviews.author: Briann
reviews.review_text:
My recent relative experience at sunlove nursing home was nothing short of infuriating, all thanks to the abysmal performance of an enrolled nurse named Carlman cafino nicoyco. To put it bluntly, he is the epitome of incompetence and indifference, and his presence only added to the already distressing environment.

It's mind-boggling how someone like Carlman cafino nicoyco even made it into the healthcare profession. His lack of care and compassion towards the elderly residents was evident in every interaction. I witnessed him treating them like inconveniences rather than human beings deserving of respect and dignity.

Not only did Carlman cafino nicoyco lack basic empathy, but he also seemed utterly clueless about his responsibilities. Residents were left waiting endlessly for their medications, while he meandered around as if their well-being was of no concern to him. It's infuriating to see someone so careless and unprofessional in a position that requires attentiveness and diligence.

Communication? Forget about it! Carlman cafino nicoyco couldn't be bothered to keep families informed about their loved ones' conditions or care plans. It was like pulling teeth just to get a simple update. This level of neglect and disregard is simply unacceptable.

I can't fathom how a nursing home could employ someone like Carlman cafino nicoyco, who clearly has no passion for the work he does. He tarnishes the reputation of the entire facility with his laziness and callous attitude.

While there were other staff members who tried to make up for Carlman cafino nicoyco shortcomings, it was evident that his negative influence permeated throughout the environment. The fact that this individual is entrusted with the care of vulnerable residents is infuriating and disheartening.

sunlove nursing home needs to take serious action to rectify this situation immediately. The well-being of its residents should be the top priority, and that means weeding out careless and apathetic employees like Carlman cafino nicoyco. It's time for management to step up and ensure that only dedicated and compassionate individuals are entrusted with the care of our loved ones.

In conclusion, my relatives experience with Carlman cafino nicoyco at sunlove nursing homewas nothing short of a nightmare. I strongly urge others to think twice before considering this facility for their loved ones' care. They deserve better than to be subjected to the negligence and indifference of someone like Carlman cafino nicoyco.

reviews.author: Faiz Putra
reviews.review_text: You should really consider putting fans at the ground lift lobby. At times wait for staff to come down nearly 10 minutes. Its stuffy and humid for ambulance staffs and also your own patients. Thank you.

reviews.author: Chee Seng Quek
reviews.review_text: My mom have been here since the centre open, the staff are very helpful and warm. Evelyn takes good care of my mom and I am grateful for it. I want to thank from the bottom of my heart. My mom really enjoy going to the centre. I know taking care of elderly is not easy, so thank you once again.

reviews.author: Charles Yuen
reviews.review_text: My dad has been visiting this centre for the past 3 months, 5 days a week.  The centre manager and staff members are very caring and attentive to every individual elderly folk there.  My dad looks forward to it every day and has even extended his time there twice a week.  He has never felt so fulfilled in a long long time with his days occupied with things to do and friends to mingle and interact with.  Thank you Anna & the Ace Team for putting the sm:)e back onto my dad's face again!  You guys and the centre are godsend!

reviews.author: Tan Linda
reviews.review_text: I am glad that I have chosen this day care centre for my mum and my mum enjoys her time and the activities there. Other than staying fit exercises, they have activities like colouring, bingo and games for elderly to keep their mind active. I am also grateful to the manager and staff there for taking care of my mum so well. There are a couple of times that my mum dun feel well and they took the necessary actions in a very prompt and timely manner. Kudos to all staff at this day care centre. Thank you very much.

reviews.author: chueypeng ng
reviews.review_text: My parents have being attending senior day care on alternate days since a year ago. The service at the center has always been very good. Recently both my parents’ health deteriorated sharply n the care required for both of them increased considerably, resulting in new demands n anguish in the family. Care center went the extra mile to provide additional support not just to my parents, but also to us a caregivers. They were both physical n emotional support. Both my parents have become difficult customers but the staff at the care center were welcoming, patient n extremely caring. Anna in particular was always on hand to lend advice as well as a warm shoulder, providing advice n offering empathy all at the same time.  She makes me n my family feel we are not alone in our arduous journey. Thank you Anna n all at the day care center who accepted my parents for all their demands tantrums n u reasonable behaviours. ❤️

reviews.author: Angela C
reviews.review_text: The staff there are very kind and patient . They love the elderly and they take very good care of my aunt who is wheelchair bound. She attends daily and a good lunch is provided . The people there generally the elderly. Transport can be arranged and our drivers are wonderful . No wonder my aunt Mdm Chong loves going there !

name: NTUC Health Day Centre for Seniors (Bukit Merah/Silat)
display_name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Bukit Merah (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care)

reviews.author: Li Li Lee
reviews.review_text: I'm thankful to get my mum enrolled in this Dementia Daycare Centre. Half a year ago, I was worried about the care plan for my mum with my dad's weakening health conditions. There was a vacancy at the centre after 2 months on the waiting list. Mum was initially reluctant to go in the first week. Centre managers Jac and Andrew and nurse Shirlynn are very caring and helpful and have found ways to manage and persuade mum to mingle and enjoy the activities with fellow patients. All other staff are friendly and patient with the seniors. Now, I have no worries about my mum and can focus on my work during the weekdays as I know she is well taken care of by a group of angels. A BIG THANK YOU!!!

reviews.author: Chwee Sian Maria Ng
reviews.review_text: The staff in Bukit Meath Center takes care of the seniors here very well. They are caring and helpful and always ensure the seniors are well looked after. My mother enjoyed going to the center and always looked forward to her day there. Thank you for looking after her well and allow my family members to have time for our own activities and peace of mind knowing she is in safe hands. A Big Thank You and Kudos to all staff at Bukit Merah Senior Center!

reviews.author: Alex Ng
reviews.review_text:
Center is clean, spacious and staff were so friendly and approachable. Most importantly, they are always available to answer phone calls. My mum enjoys going everyday to mingle and play games with folks her age.

When I suggested not going for a day, she rolled her eyes and gave me excuses as to why she has to go! Hahaha.

I feel at ease to leave my mum at the Center, as they are very accountable, and definitely safer than having her going around, roaming around the neighbourhood.

reviews.author: Kelly Mok
reviews.review_text:
My mum started going to Bt Merah Senior Day Care Centre this Jan. She was initially reluctant & insisted that she will only stay there for max 3 hours/day (Mon to Fri). As her caregiver knowing very well how impatient, fussy & difficult she is, I was actually mentally prepared for this day care plan to fail soon.

To date, although it’s only been 2 months, my mum is still going to the centre Mon to Fri and now even miraculously extended to 5 hrs stay each day!

I am vy thankful to the caring & helpful staff there & especially grateful to the Centre Manager, Ms Evelyn Khong. Starting from Day 1 she painstakingly follow through making sure my mum goes to the Centre and keep her occupied comfortably there every time.  Ms Evelyn is very professional in taking care of both my mum’s physical & emotional needs. She also keeps me updated on my mum’s progress/status timely and give me the needed caregiver support constantly. Whenever a problem occurs with my mum, Evelyn is always able to handle it patiently with great perseverance & empathy.

I am very blessed & thankful to all the Centre’s wonderful staff for taking good care of my mum in all ways thus giving me a ease of mind. 🙏🏻💖

I sincerely give them 10 stars for their excellency! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.author: Crescent
reviews.review_text:
Staff there are really kind and patient towards the elderly there. They are also especially very helpful to the elderly family members when help are needed. My grandma look forward going to the centre everyday and have fun with staffs and other elderly there. There are also alot of activities being done with the elderly and my grandma share with us everyday when she return home. We also can go to work with a peace of mind knowing that she is in great care with the staffs there.

Thank you!

reviews.author: Iris Ong
reviews.review_text:
I sincerely appreciated and thankful and touching to Nurse Kim from Kwong Wai Shiu Hospital Potong Pasir Ward 6. She really took good care of my mum. Just now my mum was crying and Nurse Kim was worried and don't understand what is she talking about due to her languages so she called asked me talked to my mum what happened. She cried is because I had not visited her for nearly a weeks plus due to me having flu. My mum was worried what is happening to me or home. I had been visiting my mum few days a week. She will keep telling me 3 nurses Nurse Kim, Stephanie and Margaret were very good and patient to her and other old folks. They are the best among other nurses. She told me she had no worries when she see them around and had been helpful to attend to her as well as other old folks including her. Of course some nurses is not as patient as them this is what I had been told during my visit. Nurse job is not a easy job. I sincerely wants to said Millions Thanks to Nurse Kim, Nurse Stephanie and Nurse Margaret and other nurses who had been taking care of my mum especially when I not around.
Iris Ong daughter of Bed 616.

reviews.author: Freddie Chew
reviews.review_text: KWSH@PTP Ward 6 has a group of very dedicated nurses and attendants who have been working tirelessly to care for those who have been there. We are blessed with especially nurse Kim and Stephanie who are taking turns to cover the shifts and leading the team to care for so many.

reviews.author: Marcus Goh
reviews.review_text: Recently the nurses from Ward 6 highlighted to me that my mum wasn’t eating. Due to mum condition she wasn’t able to communicate with them. They are prompt in contacting me as my mum needs to be admitted to hospital .A big thank you to Nurse Kim, Stephanie and team for take care of her.

reviews.author: Calvin Ng
reviews.review_text: Just want to complement Staff Nurses Kim, Stephanie and Margaret and all Nurses of Ward 6. On the 3rd of March, S/N Kim and the Nurses on duty detected a very low heart rate and low blood pressure on my sister (bed 628), Ambulance service was activated and my sister was sent to TTS A & E, the doctors managed to revived my sister heart rate and she was hospitalised for about a week. Upon discharged from the hospital, the Staff Nurses and Nurses at the  Kwong Wai Shiu nursing home gave my sister a very warm welcome and continue to monitor her well-being. The Nursing team really goes an extra miles in caring for my sister and the rest of the residents of Ward 6. Applause to all Staff Nurses and all Nurses, as they are very professional and well trained in the Nursing Care. Millions Thanks

reviews.author: Helen Yong
reviews.review_text:
I want to express my heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional nursing staff at Kwong Wai Shiu Hospital @ Potong Pasir. My husband, admitted to Ward 2A, Bed 206 in November experienced remarkable care during his brief respite stay.

The level of compassion and dedication from the nursing team left a lasting impression. I witnessed a significant improvement in my husband's skin issue, a testament to their expertise and attentive care. Their commitment to patient comfort is truly touching.

I also want to extend my deep gratitude to the foreign nursing staff. Despite being far from their own families, their care, dedication, and sacrifice are commendable. This selflessness deserves recognition. I hope this serves as an encouragement and recognition for their tireless efforts.

Thank you for the excellent care.

reviews.author: AW
reviews.review_text:
This nursing home is acting like a gov institution. Even death row inmates have rights to see visitors. This org outright refused to let me see my father without him prior knowing of such arrangment.

My mother (Pang Mee Lan) has no deputyship over my father Wong Meng Keow. Nor did my Father refuse to see me. I did not receive any court order that I cannot see my Father.

Just plain outright borderline kidnapping. I would NOT recommend anyone letting their elderly folks stay here. As on 19 March, 2023, due to a decision of 1 person I CANNOT make calls nor visit my father. A police report has been made against this home as well (See photo). Caveat Emptor!

reviews.author: IReen Lim
reviews.review_text:
Important to go down and take a look before you enrol your loved one. Depending on the subsidy you get, because ours is not very high, the daily rate is about $80-90. After my centre visit and observation, I find it’s no different between a day care or a dementia day care. Essentially there’s no programme for dementia care specifically though the programme says so.

On top of that, each “programme” only runs 1hour maybe 1.5hours, otherwise is mostly meals and tea break. So I’m paying a lot for not much.

After weighing, we decided to take dad to the Active Ageing centre - it’s free, programmes are more interesting and the people running the centre are very invested.

Again this is my personal and contrary opinion. If cost is a possible issue then do your research well.

reviews.review_text: These are necessity in everyday Singapore as our population ages.  We should have bigger facilities to accommodate more people.

display_name: Man Fatt Lam Elderly Joy Day Centre

reviews.author: sato otas
reviews.review_text:
The centre was very kind to accept me who is visually impaired when many known elderly day centres had rejected in admitting me due to my disability. The staff have ensure that I am safe during the day and well taken care of so that my family can have peace while they are at work.
The staff at the centre showered me with love and care. At the centre, I got to interact with people than just myself while i am home alone.  Everyday, they will fetch me from my home  to the centre and vice verse.  I also enjoy the various celebration at the centre.
As I aged and required diaper and to be fed, the centre has continued to extend their support to me.
They are consistent to follow up on my condition through my daughter and looking forward to welcome me back to the Center after i had discharged from the hospital. We have been blessed through their graciousness and kindness.
It is beyond word to describe our gratitudes toward the many goods we have received and benefited from your centre.
Thank you very much to your centre, each and every individual staff, who have been supporting and caring for me the past near 4 years.
Your Center has made my last few years of my journey a memorable one.  Thank you.

With love.
SKS
Written on behalf of my dad who has completed his journey in Aug 2024.

reviews.author: Yong Jenny
reviews.review_text: My mum was in rehab with them 6mths ago till now, have always paid promptly upon invoice received. 3 encounters they texted me that it was unpaid, upon their checking, it was their pc not updated and started to chase payment for nothing. Recently got worse, ask for payment again which was 4 mths back, issuance of receipt requires a week. If payment is lapsed for 4 mths, would they still allow to continue with the rehab? It is hilarious that the accountant are not doing their job and we have to bear twice payment instead.

reviews.author: Chris Pang
reviews.review_text: Centre Supervisor and team has shown heartfelt care, concern and attention to my mother who was with the centre for the past 5 years. The team put in effort to encourage and engage my mother in the activities such as art and craft, games and exercises for a wholesome engagement. Above all, my mother felt welcomed and happy during her time there. Due to relocation, our family looks forward to enroll my mother at another NTUC Senior Day Care centre in the neighbourhood.

reviews.author: E.S. Leet
reviews.review_text: The centre took care of my mother very well and I observed that the staff is caring and professional. They are also patient and understanding. I would like to thank all of them, including manager, Mr Alan, for expediting the transfer process for my mother (change of residence). It was seamless and fast.

reviews.author: Wendy Lee
reviews.review_text: I really appreciate and like to thanks Alan & the care staff team including the driver who has extended their cares & love to my mum. With their help, I am able to have peace of mind and do not need to worry about my mum's meals. I receive regular updates from the team and was also impressed with the cleaniless n well managed care centre. With the daily activities keeping my mum occupied, it gives me peace of mind and able to be more forcus on my job.

reviews.author: Sally Yow
reviews.review_text:
Really appreciate and thankful to the team in NTUC Health Silver Circle - Pasir Ris branch .. especially to Theresa, Li Hua and Frankie for being so caring to my husband during his past years in the centre.

He enjoyed his past years on all the activities conducted by the daycare.
Of course well taken care of.

But is just the past one year he diagnosed with Dementia and also lost his appetite. So we decided to take care of him at home.

I fully recommend the daycare centre to the elderly.

Anyway  thank you once again to the team in NTUC Silver Circle - Pasir Ris.

Sally Yow.

reviews.author: Angelina Koh
reviews.review_text:
My sister, Phyllis, has been going to the centre for more than 2 years. All this while she has been receiving very good care given by the staff who are very well-trained, motivated, patient, kind and respectful. When I was there on several occasions, I could feel the joy and the great sense of humour the staff exudes while interacting with all the elderly.
Furthermore, the centre manager (Mr Alan) himself showed great leadership by getting himself involved in some of the activities. He also showed concern and understanding when responding to queries of relatives of the elderly.
I would highly recommend the centre to anyone who is  seeking admission.

reviews.author: Kenneth Tay
reviews.review_text:
Mixed reviews. The home's staff is polite and experienced but what I wish to share is the attitude of the transport staff.

Appointment is made at 12:50pm to 12:55pm to pick up my mum for rehab. The transport came earlier and at 12:44pm, a transport staff with HP number ending with 0692, called my wife saying that they had arrived. On the phone, he sounded extremely impatient and says that we should be waiting downstairs for him instead. My mum was actually ready by then, we helped her to put on her shoes and push her down on her wheelchair within minutes.

Now I wish to know, if you are early, why do you blame us for not knowing you are early? What is the purpose of appointment time then? I brought my mum down with my helper, if you are unhappy, why don't you tell me off in my face? No guts to face a man and can only bully women, old folks and helpers?

Next, when my helper went down to fetch my mum up later on, someone (I cannot confirmed if he is the same person) from the transport team told off my helper and mum saying that he had waited for us for a very long time.

What is this? You had made my mum feels bad and keep apologising to me saying that she is not late. What kind of service and attitude is this?

Update: The customer service service is prompt and had contacted me to apologise for the unpleasant event. I am also in customer service industry and understand a person wrongdoing does not reflect the entire organization. Keep it up.

reviews.author: allymomo young
reviews.review_text:
The nurses are polite, helpful and caring towards visitors and residents. You can see that many are genuinely passionate in their job.

They took good care and paid close attention to my mom till the minute she passed on ...

Thank you, All Saints Home !

reviews.review_text:

reviews.review_text: Clean, well-organized with a dedicated staff, which genuinely cares for its residents. This place has a positive feeling to it. reviews.author: CCS
reviews.review_text:
I've been observing this center from a distance for a while.  I am 72, and perhaps one day, I will need to check in, too.

Finally, I strolled in on impulse and found the staff generally welcoming and provided useful information regarding what the center can provide.

For now, it seems to be geared towards elderlies whose needs are more about safety and activity. Their services will leave family members of the elderlies the peace of mind to focus on their work and lives.

I'm not sure how the new seniors fresh from professions and retirement will fit in. But I guess, ST. Luke will evolve and respond appropriately when the numbers increases.

reviews.author: Jowena Chew
reviews.review_text: I am so glad that I have found this wonderful senior daycare for my mum. She looks forward to going there every day as she told me the staff are all very nice and she learns a lot from the centre too. Thank you to Yvonne and all staff for their dedicated support so that I can fully concentrate on my work knowing that my mum is well taken care of.

reviews.author: Jas L
reviews.review_text:
The staff at this senior day care is truly exceptional. From the moment you walk in, you can tell that they genuinely care about their clients and are passionate about providing the best possible care. They are patient, compassionate, and attentive, always going above and beyond to make sure that each and every person in their care feels comfortable and safe.

One of the things that I appreciate most about this senior day care is their focus on individualised care. They understand that each person with dementia has unique needs and preferences, and they work closely with clients and their families to create personalised care plans that address those needs. Whether it's providing memory stimulation activities or helping with basic activities of daily living, the staff is always attentive to each client's needs.

The centre is clean, bright, and welcoming, and it's clear that a lot of thought has gone into creating an environment that is both safe and stimulating for people with dementia. They offer a range of activities, including exercise classes, arts and crafts, and music therapy, which help to keep clients engaged and stimulated.

Overall, I would highly recommend here to anyone looking for high-quality senior daycare with a focus on dementia care. Their exceptional staff, individualized care plans, and welcoming facilities make them stand out as one of the best in the industry.

reviews.author: Lee Lim See
reviews.review_text:
Highly appreciative to this center and the friendly professional staff.  Looking at my dad happily enjoying all the fun activities, looking after his well care and making sure he's well attended to, give us a peace of mind during our work time.

A WARM AND BIG THANK YOU NTUC Health Senior Day Care at Boon Lay Ave :)

My mom seems more alert after attending 1 month and can see that she enjoy going to the centre rather than staying at home watch TV.
Thanks to all the dedicated health care professionals in this daycare centre.

Really very thankfully to everyone at the Boon Lay ctr, all of you are truly amazing.

reviews.author: Revathi Jayan
reviews.review_text:
Pathetic place.

My grandpa was here sometime ago. I used to visit him every week. Once, he wanted water and I went to take that from the water dispenser nearby but the nurse stopped me and told me not to take from there. Then, she handed over to me something that looked cloudy to give him to drink. I asked her what is this all about, nothing but the word water came from her mouth.

Food here was as depressing as the environment. Similar menu all time my other family members had told me. Even by watching my grandpa eat, I dreaded living.

See, this is a home. It should be something that make people comfortable not something that make people anxiously look forward to their last days.

reviews.author: Veron Tan
reviews.review_text: I would like to thank Nurse Janet on her patience in taking care of my mum and the kindness she has shown to her at the day care. At times my mum may not be easy to take care due to her dementia problems. She never give up in helping her. My family and myself would like to thank her for what she has done. Much appreciated. A great staff at the centre. ❤️

I dun mind to leave cos my main purpose is to visit my mum but as a staff when u told me to check n ask me to wait u shld have the courtesy to reply me back n serve me not simply juz cal the security n chase me out . Super bad attitite . Where's yr manners? I urgent e management to teach the staffs some customer service instead of giving such attitude very bad remarks of yr institution

reviews.author: leng Wee
reviews.review_text: I can’t complain about the staff and the level of care my mum was accorded during her stay there. However knowing how climate change is affecting temperatures, even the high powered ceiling runs swirling at top speed can’t keep the heat at bay. The patients who were all seniors in the ward had no choice but to groan in the hot and humid environment in their recuperation. Perhaps the authorities have to take a fresh look at how to make the hospital stay not just minimally tolerable but a comfortable pleasant experience for this vulnerable section of our treasured community.

reviews.author: Sharon Teo
reviews.review_text:
I want to compliment the staff of Ren-ci Community Hospital for their remarkable and excellent client-centric service extended to my 84-yo mother-in-law, Mdm Tiah Leng Hway, on 13 October 2023.
Mdm Tiah had brain aneurysm on 26 Sept 2023, and admitted to TTSH .  She survived the ordeal after 2weeks+ in ICU.  Mdm Tiah was sent to Ren-ci for neuro-therapy although the living conditions there is not favourable for my mother-in-law.
The staff made all efforts to let my mother-in-law feel comfortable.  The staff are
Dr Teo Wee Shen
Mr Farouk - senior nurse manager
Ms Catherine Peh - staff nurse
Ms Marilou - senior nursing aide
Sheila - psa
Ward 11/ B28
My family and I wishes them all the best, and a BIG Thank-you for their excellent service.

reviews.author: ayaan sameer
reviews.review_text:
Ren Ci Community Hospital has truly set a benchmark in providing compassionate and comprehensive healthcare services, making it a standout institution in the realm of community healthcare. My recent experience with Ren Ci has left me not only impressed but deeply appreciative of the commitment to patient well-being and the overall atmosphere of warmth and support.

From the moment you step into the hospital, there's a palpable sense of dedication to patient care. The staff, from the front desk to the healthcare professionals, exude a genuine concern for the well-being of every individual. Their professionalism and empathy create an environment that is not only medically sound but emotionally comforting.

The facilities at Ren Ci are modern, clean, and well-maintained. The hospital's commitment to providing state-of-the-art medical services is evident in the quality of equipment and the efficiency of operations. The rooms are designed with patient comfort in mind, offering a peaceful and healing environment.

One of the standout features of Ren Ci is the holistic approach to healthcare. Beyond medical treatments, there is a strong emphasis on rehabilitation and wellness. The hospital's dedication to supporting patients on their journey to recovery extends to comprehensive rehabilitation services, including physical therapy, occupational therapy, and more.

The communication between the medical staff and patients is commendable. Doctors take the time to explain diagnoses and treatment plans in a clear and understandable manner, fostering a sense of collaboration and trust. This transparency in communication goes a long way in alleviating the anxiety that often accompanies healthcare experiences.

Ren Ci also stands out in terms of community engagement. The hospital actively participates in outreach programs and health education initiatives, demonstrating a commitment to promoting wellness beyond its walls. This community-oriented approach contributes to a positive cycle of overall health improvement in the surrounding area.

In conclusion, Ren Ci Community Hospital has earned its reputation as a paragon of compassionate healthcare. The blend of cutting-edge medical services, empathetic staff, and a commitment to holistic well-being creates an environment that is not just healing but uplifting. For individuals seeking healthcare that goes beyond clinical expertise, Ren Ci is undoubtedly a beacon of excellence in community-centered medical care.

reviews.author: seah teck yew
reviews.review_text: The management and staffs are all well trained in taking care of the elderly. My mother has been there almost 2 years, l  like to thanks all staffs at NTUC Health Senior Day Care at Dakota for their hard work. Thank you Jasmine and your team

reviews.author: tonghowe seeto
reviews.review_text:
Well trained and disciplined staffs. Very organise and dedicated team of care givers.  The centre is very well managed.  The Manager and team of supervisors regularly communicate with the family members to share care tips.

What I like most is the meal preparation.  Proper fresh cook food, real utensils, not disposable ones.  Give my parent a very home feeling.

reviews.author: Tew Siew Yen
reviews.review_text:
My mom has been going to the Senior Day Care Center at Dakota since December 2021. Initially, she was very reluctant, and we had difficulties motivating her to go to the center.

The team at Dakota did magic and after some weeks of trying, mom now looks forward to going to the center every morning including the weekends! She really enjoys her time at the center and kept asking why the center is not opened on weekends.

The team at Dakota takes good care of mom, and we feel safe leaving mom in their hands. In addition, the center keeps constant contact with me to ensure we update closely each other on mom's well-being, which I really appreciate.

In a recent conversation with mom, I asked her: "If I am obliged to write a compliment letter to the center, is there any staff who takes special attention and care on you, and that you would like me to praise him/her?"

Mom's reply: "Every staff is nice and takes care of me. You must write a compliment letter to each and every individual staff there."

Kudos to the team at Dakota!

reviews.author: Joyce Ngo
reviews.review_text:
I am very impressed with the Senior Day Care Center at Dakota Crescent that is tidy clean and well organized. I am very pleased and thankful to all the staffs and especially Jasmine the manager who build up a strong team work spirit. Nurse Prasana , Joan n Radiah are helpful and they are very concern
about the health and wellbeing of the old folks.
My mum is very fortunate and she has been attending the centre for almost five years. The daycare centre is well recommended.

reviews.author: Magdalene Tang
reviews.review_text: My father has been attending Dakota NTUC Health Senior Day Care for almost 6 months. The various activities at the center keeps him occupied and he enjoys spending his time there. Meals are also provided, the experienced and well trained staff are always there to provide assistance. The facility is also well maintained and clean. Taking care of the elderly can be challenging, my family is glad and thankful to Staff Radiah, Prasana, Uncle William, Uncle Hee and Center Manager Jasmine for their patience and care. They have also been very responsive to my family's queries and provides frequent feedback on my father's wellbeing. We will highly recommend Dakota NTUC Day Care Center.

reviews.review_text: My Dad has been at the centre since November 2023. He has made significant improvements so far and he is happy there. All the staff are wonderful, warm caring patient and absolutely a fantastic team. Well done and keep up the good work.

reviews.review_text: My mother was at the Fengshan day care Center for a month and she was very pleased with the service and facilities. She especially liked the staff members because they were caring, helpful and very approachable. I am very grateful to them for taking such good care of my mother and for constantly updating about whether she is fitting in and how she relates to the others around her. The staff members are also quick to act on suggestions. I really want to thank Fion and all the staff members with all my heart.

reviews.author: Zenus Ee
reviews.review_text: My dad was at Silver Circle Fengshan for around 2 years and it was a pleasant experience for us as Caregiver. Would like to thanks all the staffs there especially Fion Yeo who really went to the extend to help and listen to our story when we are in difficulties. Once again, thank you.

reviews.author: LECIA AW aw
reviews.review_text:
Excellent job, providing diligent and attentive care; friendly staffs who are attentive to elderly needs and always send photos and update elderly conditions to the family.

Cosy environment with great facilities. They also plan great activities (e.g. art&craft, photoshoot and exercise sessions).
My mother in law has been under their care for 10 years and their service has always been beyond satisfactory.

reviews.author: Meg
reviews.review_text: I want to thank everyone at Feng Shan for the excellent care you all have provided for my grandpa. He enjoys the sessions and often come home raving about how much fun he had.  My family has such peace of mind knowing he is in good hands :)

display_name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Punggol South (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care)

reviews.author: Wee Holmes
reviews.review_text:
My mum have been attending Punggol South NTUC Health Day Care Centre for Seniors for the past year and I would like to share my complements to all staff for always being meticulous and attentive to the needs of the elderly.

They manage to care in such an uncompromising way that exhibits their tireless effort, patience and passion for the job. Every morning my mum exhibits eagerness to go to the centre, and comes home excited and proud of her own achievements (small treats and prizes won during mini activities) and pretty artworks that she worked on with the help of the staff. It is always heartening to see how well cared for she is both physically and emotionally.

One incident I wish to highlight in particular occurred on 18 July. My mum had wandered away from home and attempted to navigate to the centre alone instead of waiting for her usual transport and escort to pick her up. One of the centre staff, Ms Cindy, on her way to pick up other elderly spotted my mum looking lost in the nearby environment, and swiftly brought her into safety of the centre and contacted me immediately to assure me that my mum was safe.

Words couldn't fully express the sincere gratitude I feel towards this amazing team, my deepest appreciation to everyone at Punggol South NTUC Health Day Centre for Seniors for always being attentive and their efforts for keeping our elderly safe and happy.

reviews.author: Jennifer Ng
reviews.review_text: The staff in the daycare centre are very responsible and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure comfort and safety of the elderly. My mother  in law has become more cheerful and happy after attending the day care and she always mentioned to us that she was very well taken care of by the staff there including the driver who picks her up and send her home. Thank you for taking such good care of my mother in law.

reviews.author: Julius Foo
reviews.review_text:
It has been about 10 months since my dad started coming to the daycare.

I am very thankful for the following reasons:

1. It gives us a peace of mind to know that my dad is being taken care of during the day while we are at work
2. The staff have been very open and respectful and I find that I can trust them with my dad
3. We are in constant communication with each other

I understand that many activities have been put on hold because of the pandemic. Hopefully they can be reinstated in time to come.

Thank you everyone for your hard work!

reviews.author: Vincent Lim
reviews.review_text: My Dad is attending the Day Care at the Punggol South centre. So far we are very happy with their services provided. Ranging from daily transport arrangement to the activities and professionalism of the care givers at the centre. The cleanesness of the centre are well taken care off as well. My Dad have made new friends and learn new things/activities when attending the Day Care there. The Centre Manager - Amy and her team has done a great job in taking care of my Dad and trust the same goes to the rest of the attendees there too.

reviews.author: Hazel Vini
reviews.review_text: HAAHHAHA I am punggol south first intern for 3 months straight and I had the time working and improving myself! staffs were all kind and thoughtful! :)) they taught me almost I can learn in days so it would be easy on me. I ended my internship in very good note ! and I miss y'all very much

A beautiful place for the folks who lives there and they are very well taken care of.

Many friendly staffs and volunteers.
Staffs are friendly and happy, serving with a heart ❤.
Volunteers are aplenty. They come in many different ages. They help to organise activities for the residence all year round.

This place is called
SWAMI Home for short.
They organise talks and events at the auditorium, from various organisations too.

This place is somewhat spiritual I must say.

Pictures of Events organised shown for the various races with all respect to the faith believers.

Oh did I mentioned there is a spice garden? Nice cosy area to be.

Well done to all the people who work, volunteer and support SWAMI HOME and keeping the place running in a positive energy. 🙏

reviews.review_text: Sunshine Welfare Action Mission also called SWAMI, it's a nursing home dedicated to care for the old and the sick. The place is clean, neat and spacious. Staff are friendly and helpful. They have a pond full of koi fish for residents to watch and relax..  there are many sitting areas for visitors too. The rooms are well ventilated and the cleaners make sure all areas are properly sanitised and clean up after each meal time. They is a shopping mall nearby SWAMI and car parks are readily available at SWAMI as well.

reviews.author: Michelle B
reviews.review_text: Wonderful place assisting the elderly with dementia. The staff were fantastic with the patients and knew how to engage them.

reviews.author: Daliah Moss
reviews.review_text:
My family is indebted to the Tampines Horizon Centre for the wonderful care they gave our mother Aminah Ahmad for the almost 10 years she attended your facility. I sincerely believe that  her regular participation at your centre had an enormous positive impact on the quality and enjoyment of her final years of life.  After her first few visits, she could not wait to get there each morning.  The gentle caring and professional attention shown to her was always greatly appreciated.  All staff, from the Director to the cleaning staff always exhibited such care and hospitality.  I have visited  many facilities in various countries ( including Australia where the model of care was originally adapted from) and while some other facilities may have more expensive surrounds and  gadgets and possibly more "certification qualified"staff, your staff and volunteers constantly demonstrated care of the highest and exceptional quality.  I am sorry to have taken so long to write this but I have only stumbled on this opportunity to thank you publicly when helping a cousin to find support for her mum.
May you all be blessed for your compassion and care.
sincerely, daliah Moss ( Broome, Australia)

reviews.author: Keith Chng
reviews.review_text:
To NHC Tampines team.  A sincere thank you from our family for the wonderful love and care showered towards my mother (Mdm Leow). Though the journey with her was rough but your team derived a strategic management plan for her. Not to mention the energy the team had shown.  During the time my mom was there, we learnt a lot too about the do & don't through the interaction with the team.

Most importantly, she was well taken care of these years at your centre. It had been our blessing to have had sent her to your centre. We are not sugar-coating as your centre had helped us tremendously, especially for my father, overcoming the darkest moment in caring for my mother.

The service that your team has provided to families with PWD(Patient With Dementia) is an integral aspect of the holistic care that cannot be substituted or undermined. Such support means very much to us (families with PWD) although appreciative words are not mentioned often, the gratitude is felt in our hearts. God will bless all of you for persevering in such meaningful but seldom appreciated or spoken job.

reviews.author: Eddie Teo
reviews.review_text: nice friendly staff taking care of the elderly, can see they really put in heart when taking care of the elderly.

reviews.author: David Lim
reviews.review_text: Good service for patients with Alzehmier's Disease and Dementia. Friendly and courteous staff.

reviews.author: Teng Li Yun
reviews.review_text: My mom is a patient at New Horizon. Before that I was searching for a daycare centre that was suitable for her as I am looking for a daycare centre with caring individuals and a place where my mom is comfortable with and the place is none other than New Horizon! My mom enjoy going there. The staff there are amazing they remember each patient and treated them with respect, there which is a + point for me. Always smiley to the elders, never ever see them give attitude when the elderly need help! ✌️The activity given for the patients was good to ensure they are engage! Nurse Steven is very nice and caring he take note of small details of my mom condition too.  Really thankful to each and every staff of New Horizon Toa Payoh!!

reviews.author: Beehong Lee
reviews.review_text: The family of Mdm Chua Cheow Tee wishes to express our heart felt thanks to the Staffs, Nurses and Managements of New Horizon Centre (Toa Payoh) that has been providing professional and caring services to my Dementia mother.  We like to say special thanks to Steven who is taking care of my mother, is  efficient and detailed in handling my mother daily well being. For example, when there was bruise on my mother's hands, he would inform inform us immediately.  He also checked my mother's  medicine record to find out the possible cause of the bruise and advised us accordingly. Well done, Steven.

reviews.author: Betty Wong
reviews.review_text: My husband is a dementia patient and I really appreciate that there is a centre like New Hoizon dementia centre. The staff there are friendly. The place is kept very clean all the time. My husband is happy to be there and whenever he comes back from the Centre , he is very happy. There are plenty of food for him to eat and the staff are very patient to wait for him to finish his food at every meal as he eats very slowly. 👍👍👍for the Centre., and thank you to all staff working there. God bless you all.

Majolah Singapore song & pladge.
At the same time, breakfast served.
Sketching exercises in the morning.
Elderly toilets times  & sanctify hands...rest.
Lunchtime serves at 1200 noon.
After lunch, watch video programmes.
Some elderly like to play mahjong/ rummyO games..... Some like colouring...
There  are helpers  alway around.

A good place for retired to spend time., rather sitting /sleeping at home.

Can't take pictures in the centre., as there is not allowed.

reviews.author: Hua Teck Tan
reviews.review_text: A relative attend day care at the centre, I think what stands out is the caring staff who are really attentive and concerned.

reviews.author: D. Y.
reviews.review_text: My mother has been in the dementia day care programme for nearly 3 months now and I only have the best words to say about it. The team is dedicated and professional, always ensuring that my mother gets the care and support needed when she is there. My mother always shares with us that the staff is very nice and caring, and that she likes the food & activities. I am really happy knowing that she is enjoying her time there and keeping her mind engaged at the same time.

reviews.author: Azrina _
reviews.review_text:
All the staffs are efficient and they help my Mother to adapt well in the Daycare. I also like to especially thank the Bus Captain and Escort for being very friendly and cheerful when picking my Mother from our home to the Daycare. All the staffs are a Gem to the company.
Good job ! May God Bless all of you !

reviews.author: emily lim
reviews.review_text:
We sincerely appreciate Kampung Admiralty's team of caring staff who are patient and kind to our 84-yr-old mother with dementia. Thank you for your gracious actions and words, creating positive experiences for our aging mother in your centre each day.

Special thanks to your very friendly bus escort Richard and driver Siew Lee, who helped our anxious mother relax in their bus transport when she started in mid Feb this year.

Thank you, Mgr Mei Ling and Nurse Natasha for overseeing our mother's well-being, and giving us peace of mind.

reviews.author: Irene Tan
reviews.review_text: From the bottom of our hearts, we thank all the staff at the Health Senior day care- Kampung Admiralty. My spouse enjoys the food and looks forward to going to the centre everyday, which shows the warm environment and the dedicated efforts of everyone. Special shoutout to manager MeiLing, Vincent, Philip, Cecilia, Grace, Nurse Jeth and others more.

reviews.author: Nancy Aw
reviews.review_text: Great caring altitude of staff who genuinely care for the elderly.  I know that once my Dad is dropped off at the Day Care @ Kampung Admiralty, I can safely leave him there without having to worry of his welfare and if he is being taken care of and I am able to focus on my work.  The attending would also call to check with me if there are any issues and as well would sometimes give a report of how my dad is doing.    Dad would would come home with some drawing/coloring and art & crafts and I would know that there are enough program to keep him occupied.  Just 1 month tnto the day care, I heard my dad has made a couple of friends and has become more alert.   Great centre and superb staff.

reviews.author: Lois Setoh
reviews.review_text: My father in law was with NTUC Eldercare for 2.5 years. Nurse Kim and the nursing team have been helpful. It's not easy to care for dementia patients and my father in law praise Nurse Kim's patient care and heart while he was there and has fond memories.

reviews.author: Helen Soh
reviews.review_text:
NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Heartbeat @ Bedok.
We like to extend our deepest gratitude and appreciation to each one of you at the Day Care Centre especially to Ms. Sandy, Nurses - Kim, Franz, April, Drivers - Chester and Heng, CA - Jennifer, Vivien, Jacy and Phyu Phyu . For the delication and extraordinary care provided to our mum Yan Ah Toh. She has changed to a very  cheerful, happy and eagerly looking forward to go to the day care centre every day.

reviews.author: Li Li Chua
reviews.review_text: The staff at Day Care Centre at Heartbeat Bedok are very friendly and helpful towards the seniors. The centre itself is quite spacious and has many activities for the seniors to engage with. The centre supervisor, Mr Chua and manager, Ms Sandy Neo are very knowledgeable and able to handle the seniors with ease. I can see that Ms Sandy is very dedicated and made an effort to talk to and understand my dad's needs. Thank you Ms Sandy and all staff at the centre!

reviews.author: Loh Mei Fong
reviews.review_text:
There was no second thought for our family to place my father who had dementia at NTUC Health Senior Day care located in Bedok Heartbeat few years ago. We were truly impressed with the cosy ambience, clean & well organised environment, the spacious layout and most importantly the warm & friendly staff who attended to us.
Team leader Ms Sandy is very dedicated & professional in responding to any of our concerns we raised.  She will make sure her team do their very best to give the family the assurance & confidence that our loved ones will be  well taken care of. Last but not least, the other staff whom I know of is Nurse Hannah, Centre supervisor Mr Chua & the transport team , are all so helpful , responsible & caring.
Really appreciate & thankful for their kindness & patience given to our loved ones. Managing the centre & taking care of the elderly Is definitely not an easy task,  but they have proven to us a job well done.
Thumbs up to all the staff at NTUC Health Senior Day Care-Heartbeat@Bedok & a Big Thank You on behalf of my family.

reviews.author: Lau Ju Hong
reviews.review_text:
I strongly recommend NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Heartbeat@Bedok (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care), In charge Ms. Sandy, Nurse Ms. Hannah Mr. Chua, Nurse Ms. Kim, Ms. Jasmine, Ms. Linda, Mr. Heng (Transport) and all the staff.
Their passion and patience, thoughtfulness and attentiveness in handling all elderly in the center are beyond words can describe.
My dad is diagnosed with Dementia, we need someone to take care of him during the daytime while I go to work.
We did go to other DC in the East area, but their Environment wasn’t as warm as NTUC DC (Heartbeat). The moment we step into the DC, my dad immediately dislikes and want to go back home
But when we went for pre-entry assessment in DC(Heartbeat), Ms. Sandy, and Nurse Hannah received us, they bought us into a cozy room and serve my dad breakfast and a hot drink (Remember his Smiling face).
When Nurse Hannah did the assessment with my dad, she was so patient with him.
Long story short, 3 months now, he now looking forward to DC every day. The Centre will continually update my dad’s situation and activity.
For family members that looking for Daycare Centre. with Ms. Sandy’s Team, you truly can rest assured your loved ones are well taken care.

Iris Lau
