reviews.review_text: A big shout out to your team for doing a wonderful work 👏 👏 👏.  Not only is this center clean , bright, airy,  the staff have been very supportive too. My dad enjoyed going to the center and has even found his hobby - colouring 😃 And that really helped him to be more focused and staying alert. Today's anniversary was a great success and was amazed by my dad participation in the dance moves 🥳😄

reviews.author: Aishah Junit
reviews.review_text: Im very happy to be joining the day care center. Feeling so excited to come everyday. Looking forward everyday to meet my friend and all the staffs. Especially staff Apple. She is very jolly and makes all us happy. Hope them all the best for daily life...

reviews.author: Yi Hui Angeline Lam
reviews.review_text: Thank you to all the nurses and staff at NTUC Health Senior Day Centre (Tamp) for taking such good care of our mummies and grandmothers. My grandma has dementia and is currently in good hands. I can now go to work without worrying as I know she's definitely enjoying herself there. Grandma has many friends there and looks forward to her weekdays. Really kudos to the team. :)

reviews.author: vaxanne
reviews.review_text: The daycare is spacious and well-laid out. The management capped the capacity at 60 which is low compared to many daycares I’ve visited. The staff are professional and dedicated to their work. They deserve the recognition matched with monetary remuneration

reviews.author: Hanin Hussain
reviews.review_text: My mother goes to the centre twice a week. She calls it her exercise place. I have noticed she is more alive now and has new stories to tell us. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the place hasa cheerful vibe to it.💕

reviews.author: Sherlyn Toh
reviews.review_text:
If can rate 0 star, I would have.
Totally nonsense rehab center but not referring to block 557 which is for dementia senior citizens.
There's another center at 561 (same area, 2 blocks away from 557).

No progress updated, once complaint straight away said 50% improvement when granny is still unable to stand, let alone walk.
Siding their staff after complain, pushing all blame to helper.

Rude staff & physiotherapy. Claimed that family member did not came down to see how their staff doing their job. FYI, i have been there on multiples days & MAJORITY of the time my granny waited about 20-30min for her next exercise.

Most of the elderly are sat there and waiting for their turn (more than 15min wait though).
So think twice to send your elderly here for "exercise".

& of cos 1st few weeks, family member definitely can see how they take "good care" of your elderly. E.G. going into their physio room for 1-to-1 assessment. Months later left them at the table & ROT.

My granny has been there for a year, & she used the exercise machines less than 5 times. (Start count after I went there with granny recently which is about 1 month ago)
So basically 11 months while being there, she has not been touching any machines.

reviews.author: Jerry QUEK Cheng Pang
reviews.review_text:
A care centre for Dementia patients.Can see family members or maids bringing senior citizens (both men & women ) with Dementia here for treament and training.Good for our country to have such care centres to provide care and services for these patients.
Dated : 04/10/2017 ( Wednesday ).

reviews.author: Soniya Kulkarni
reviews.review_text: The staff and the palliative doctors are compassionate and took great care of my ailing relative. The nursing home is clean, hygienic and provide a welcoming environment for both patients and their families. I would recommend them to anyone looking for pallative care.

reviews.author: Ah chi ma Lim
reviews.review_text: The experience initially was a bad one. I seeked help from the nurses if they can check my aunt's diaper was soiled. I received a glare from one of them. Even with fans , the place is really hot and stuffy . Along with other unpleasant incidents over here   I finally broke down and cried thinking how suffering it is to stay here...  The 2nd visit I met nurse WaiNa. I felt assured after i observed how she treated the old folks there attending to them with passion just like they were her own parents. She even bother to explain to me about dementia people and what to expect. WaiNa is really a Gem the reason why this place gets a four star despite of other unpleasants incidents with other staff nurse.. Nurse Tusal is also quite nice and patience.  Thank you both of you.

reviews.author: Mohd Hasif
reviews.review_text: Staff are friendly and cheerful to everyone. Willing to help with no second thoughts. The food provided is nice

reviews.author: Mala Hermann
reviews.review_text: All the care team, staff nurse Shi Shi, Nurse manager Joyce and palliative doctors took great care of my father while he was in Peaceheaven. They made sure his last days were spent in comfort and minimum pain. MSW Shue ling at Peacehaven is the most exceptional social worker we have experienced in all these years. The kindness and compassion she showed to my father and my family made a world of difference at such a difficult time. She gave us regular updates and all our requests were accomodated with kind understanding. Although I was overseas, she made sure I was there for my father's last breath together with my family via videocall. The skype virtual visits at Peacehaven made it possible for me to see my father everyday. Words can't express our gratitude and thanks to Peacehaven and to their whole team. May god bless you all for the work you do.

reviews.author: Sally Lai
reviews.review_text: The nurses are very attentive and the environment is very conducive for patients to recover !

reviews.review_text: I feel so safe staying in this Home I was always alone in my flat at Bukit Batok since my only son has to work. I fell a few times when I was outside my flat. The doctors strongly recommended me to stay in the Senja Care Home  Here I am cared for by the nurses and staff 24 hours. They made sure I was safe and well cared for Thank you all staff and nurses ! Keep up the good work

Nice environment.

Patient in the nursing home keep on shouting and shouting for nurses, but the nurses here just ignoring them. Disappointed, paid thousand plus a month but get this kind of service.

reviews.author: dhenizh
reviews.review_text: Good training curriculum on OFA and CPR-AED. Instructors are well versed on practical knowledge.

reviews.author: Kel N
reviews.review_text:
Absolute joke of a place. Went with some colleagues as part of corporate training. Kept myself engaged during lessons, passed with flying colours and worked during breaks.

I went back to my office and guess what? They took the time to FIND and CALL my company's HR to complain that I was late and not paying attention. (I was not, the maximum was showing up 5mins late on the first day since it's was inconveniently located and travelling 1 hour was insufficient for me.)

This is not Primary School/Kindergarten, everyone is an adult with responsibilities. Try harder, and perhaps target someone who's actually lazing off? ....Maybe not the CEO or a person who can influence where we conduct safety trainings? Nevertheless, blacklisted this company throughout my entire organization (>1000+ Staff).

Now, we get certified elsewhere and it is such a great and enjoyable time with absolutely no drama or childish behaviour.
TRUST THE BAD REVIEWS ABOUT THE TERRIBLE SERVICE/STAFF. It's definitely an on-going thing if it's been happening for years. We PAY to come here in order to try and help save lives (by volunteer basis), not get a second mother.

reviews.author: Haryati M
reviews.review_text: I did my 2day CPR + AED First Aid course here and really enjoyed it. Although there was a quite a lot to learn, the course was very well planned and the trainers were very competent, professional and engaging. I would like to personally thank Ho Jing Yew, Jeslyn Tan and Lee Sheng Ming for their guidance and dedication. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Reluctant Complainer
reviews.review_text:
Last week I went for the standard first aid course. The main trainer was quite good, she was knowledgeable and patient. However, on the last day of practical, myself and another participant were paired with a spectacles wearing trainer named Mr Liu. When I did my CPR on the dummy, he commented that i was too fat and needed to lose weight in order to do the CPR properly. I was shocked as no one had been so rude to me since the SAF army days. Liu continued to berate myself and my fellow attendee, saying how subpar our skills were at CPR and first aid. He then failed us and made us repeat the test on the spot. Another participant who was deemed to be more competent than myself was also not spared from his rudeness, telling him that in a 'real life situation, please don't cause people to die'.

Liu then treated the 3 of us attendees like children, saying that he only allowed us to pass because 'the course was designed this way'. I was too upset and shocked to report him to the chief trainer on the spot. I also did not want to risk failing my first aid course and forfeiting my payment. However, should i need to renew my first aid in 2 years, I am considering to not renew it and just letting the validity expire and retaking it with another organization should trainers like Liu be allowed to teach at St. John. He is the most insulting, demeaning trainer i have met in my whole life who thinks this is the SAF and all we participants wanted was to be given a fair chance to learn without being insulted.

I hope Saint John Singapore looks into this, if not, you guys are going to lose more students in the years to come.

reviews.author: Hong Nian
reviews.review_text: I'm very disappointed at st John HQ for cancelling BCLS course on the actual day even though we waited  for 2hr and we have to personally contact the HQ ppl then they told us . This furthermore prevent us to be certified to execute the task on our event. Not going to trust St John again:(

.

reviews.review_text: The Center is clean and spacious.  More importantly, the staff are cheerful and pays attention to my Mother's medical and toilet needs.  She is happy attending each day.

I wish everyone the best and keep up the good efforts in creating a safe, clean, condusive , engaging with activities and always putting the elderly clients' safety lst.

reviews.review_text:
My dad & I had a delightful experience with Ms Shirley, the Centre Manager, alongside Ms Vivian, the Centre's Nurse, during my dad's Assessment & Orientation session at the NTUC Health Senior Day Care @ Wisma Geylang Serai recently.

The centre was neat, organised with a high level of cleanliness.

Thank you for the attention to my dad's needs & well-being. Greatly appreciate your patience and understanding wrt my dad's challenges with transitions.

reviews.author: AL Chan
reviews.review_text: The Centre has a done good job in inducting my parents into the program and making them feel at home. The staff are very professional and always mindful of any health and other issues faced by my parents, for example they were careful to monitor the liquid intake of my father who has low blood sodium. I really appreciate the hard work and the level of care and concern they have in looking after them. Thank you.

reviews.author: Agnes lee
reviews.review_text: My stroke/dementia grandmother started her day care and rehabilitation there since March. They are very professional and mindful of my grandmother conditions. They give us very good advice on what we should do and even help to educate my helper. My grandmother always tell us she  look forward to go to the daycare. A special thank to Shirley (day care ) Vivian (centre nurse) Yian Nee (physiotherapist) Miss Chai ( Occupational Therapist).  Thank you for brightening my grandmother day! 🙏🙏

reviews.author: Cath Thong
reviews.review_text: The rehabilitation centre has provided excellent and useful therapy services for my mum. The therapists, Yian Nee, Yu Fang and Jenny are warm, friendly, attentive and accommodative to our needs. Under their care, my mum has shown remarkable improvement in her movements and daily activities!

reviews.author: Kris Lee
reviews.review_text:
Very thankful and grateful to the staff of Wisma Geylang Serai for taking care of my mum. Appreciate Chin Yang and Shirley for assisting my family on my mother's matters.
Centre is cosy and my mother looks forward to coming to the centre.

reviews.author: Willie Toh
reviews.review_text: NTUC Health Senior Day Care Centre at Chai Chee has been providing very good elderly care to my parents. They are very attentive to the needs of the old folks and closely monitor and update me when they discover anything amiss such as when they saw bruises on my dad’s arm (he is on blood thinner). They also look after their diet well and follow up keenly on any change in post medical appointment medication.  A big thank you to the management n staff of the centre!

reviews.author: Elicia Tan
reviews.review_text: My father joined NTUC daycare at Chai Chee in Dec 2020 & it is the best decision I made for him.  The staff are caring and organised in communication.  His health have improved greatly both mentally and physically.  Most impt of all, he enjoyed going there.  Hope the centre can conduct more art and craft activities as the elderly enjoy doing and if possible allow to bring home so that they can happily and proudly showed to the family.  It boost up their morales. My father also enjoy the festive celebrations. Well done NTUC, keep it up! Thanks.

reviews.author: Rūkasu
reviews.review_text:
Every morning you can hear them conducting excercise routine for the elderly folks, definitely a good way to keep them happy and entertained. During the 4 major festive , you can hear them celebrating with the elder folks as well! Kudos to the team of care staff behind all these.

When I passed by the arrival point, I can see the care staff were carefully helping the elder folks get off the bus safely. Seems like a bunch of caring staff. Also the elder folks seems to be enjoying themselves at this center.

reviews.author: Shaun Wong
reviews.review_text: My mother have been with the day care center for more than 2 years.  She is very happy at the day care center, she gets to make new friends, engage in activities - e.g. simple handcraft, or excursions (pre-covid19).  The staff are very friendly, helpful, occasionally would give my mother a warm hug.  They are attentive to her needs (e.g. toilet runs), ensure that she is well looked after at the center. reviews.author: Zann Lee
reviews.review_text:
My mom is a dementia patient and she suffers from depression at the same time. I brought her to St Luke’s ElderCare Hougang Meadow Centre on 15 Aug 2018.

In my brief interaction with the day care centre staffs and the feedback from my mom, I gathered that the staff are indeed passionate & caring. We feel a great sense of relief after my mom started attending the day care centre. Within the short span of a week, her mood changed tremendously. She seems much happier and looks forward to going to the centre daily. She kept singing praises of the day care centre staff, saying that they are very caring and show great concern towards the old folks.

Special mention goes to Molly and Daniel who are extremely caring and also for providing her safe trips to and from her home. We feel so happy as mom found a second home as well as physical & mental well being.

We will highly recommend SLEC to old folks.

The centre ambiance is clean, and organised.
The staff are friendly and attentive. they will make sure all patients are engaged in the activities to stimulate their brain.  I would like to specially thanks to Mr Daniel & Mr william,  who always joke with my mom. She likes the good attitude of staff there.

I would not hesitate to recommend this senior care centre to anyone who need this service for their love ones

reviews.author: Pauline Pee
reviews.review_text:
I would like to take this opportunity to thank the staff of NTUC Health Senior Day Care (Jurong Spring) for the care and support provided to my parents.

Ever since my parents attended the Day Care centre, they grew attached to the centre. The staff take great care not only to my parents but also to all the seniors. Every morning they’ll welcome every senior with a cheerful smile, chat to them, support them and encourage them to participate in those fun activities provided by the centre.

My mother was hospitalised for mild stroke few weeks ago. One of the staff, Mr. Rahim took his own time during the weekend to visit my mother with his wife. He even bought her a bouquet of flower, making my mom so happy. We are truly touched by Mr. Rahim’s generosity and kindness.

Once again, thank you so much! Your work makes a difference in the lives of so many, and we are grateful for all that you do.

reviews.author: Linda Ng
reviews.review_text: NTUC Health Jurong Spring Senior Day Care is the perfect place for seniors like my mother in-law  to make new friends, engage in meaningful activities and exercises as well as having very balanced and nutritious meals. My mother in-law is very happy and I am glad we found them, their Center Manager, Ms. Xu is an exceptional caregiver and her staff whom we have encountered so far are excellent and genuine in their caretaking of my mother in-law and others under their charge. Kudos and thanks to all of them and I only wished I had found the center earlier!

reviews.author: Yvonne Low
reviews.review_text: Dear staff of NTUC a day care, thank you so much. My mom told me that she is very happy that she is going to the centre. She told me that the staff are very caring and kind, and the activities makes her feel happy. I am so grateful that you are taking care of my mom so well thank you 🙏

reviews.author: kok hou koh
reviews.review_text: Started in early Feb2022 I admitted my father to the dementia senior day care service at NTUC Health Day Care Jurong Spring. So far my experiences with the Centre's staffs is excellent. The centre manager whom I usually engage with, is patience and always willing to hear and talk to the patient's family members/caregivers. They are very accommodating, helpfully to go some extra miles to help out with my request. As we are requested by the NUH Geri specialist to monitor the blood pressure (BP) of my father so that they can better reassess his medication requirement, the centre is understanding and able to assist us in the matter.  In one particular incident, the staff found that my father's blood pressure shot up to above 200 and I was notified immediately. My sibling was able to immediately react and brought my father to visit the GP for check up. Since then my father is given Valsartan medication to control his blood pressure level. It was a crucial intervention. The team nurse had diligently collected and helped prepare my father's blood pressure data report which will becomes useful to show to the NUH Geri specialist whom the doctor can administer his medical condition. Really grateful to the staffs and thankful of their services.

reviews.author: DT7056
reviews.review_text: We have admitted my mum to the new Jurong Spring senior day care centre. Compared to the previous day care center my mum attended, Jurong Spring is larger and brighter. Its staff are professional and keep us informed of my mum's activities. Most importantly, she likes it.

reviews.review_text: My mum went to NTUC Health Senior Day Care (Bukit Batok West) for more than 2 years.  Each time we went to fetch her from the day centre, she would be smiling saying her goodbye to the staff. The staff there took very good care of her and made her very happy. They are also very careful when administering medication and I always feel at ease as I'm assure that my mum was in good hands.  Special thanks to staff Stephanie, Suhaila, Wendy, Cecilia, Nurse Joy and a gentlemen who drives the centre's bus (pardon me for not knowing his name).  You all are amazing.  Thank you for showering my mum with care and love... and thank you for making her laugh.  I wish everyone at the centre all the best! ❤

reviews.author: Bernard Yeo
reviews.review_text: I want to thank all the staff at NTUC Health Senior Day Care centre at Bukit Batok, especially the Centre Supervisor, Ms Wendy Wong, for taking excellent care of my mom when she was with the centre. My mom said that every staff at the centre were always prompt and attentive to her and they took great care to make sure that she was safe. The centre was also very prompt in keeping me updated of my mom's development and were observant of her health. It was a staff at the centre who noticed that my mom's toe was swollen and promptly informed me. This allowed me to take prompt action. My mom is now recuperating at home and doing well. Thank you for your timely intervention. Special thanks to the Centre Supervisor, Ms Wendy Wong, who was my main point of contact.

reviews.review_text:

Taking care of seniors are no easy task and it takes great dedication and attention which I salute to every single one of the staff at the centre. Keep up the good work!

Cindy
Daughter

It is very comforting as children to know that my mum does not complain going to daycare and always looking forward to go to the daycare at Bukit Batok for the friendly and caring atmosphere.

I am extremely thankful to all the team in the daycare at Bukit Batok for making my mum feel at home.

I am very grateful for all your care and excellent services and recognise all your commitment and dedication taking care of the elderly in your daycare centre.

Thank you once again.

Best regards
Annie Goh - daughter

reviews.author: Soniya Kulkarni
reviews.review_text: The staff and the palliative doctors are compassionate and took great care of my ailing relative. The nursing home is clean, hygienic and provide a welcoming environment for both patients and their families. I would recommend them to anyone looking for pallative care.

reviews.author: Ah chi ma Lim
reviews.review_text: The experience initially was a bad one. I seeked help from the nurses if they can check my aunt's diaper was soiled. I received a glare from one of them. Even with fans , the place is really hot and stuffy . Along with other unpleasant incidents over here   I finally broke down and cried thinking how suffering it is to stay here...  The 2nd visit I met nurse WaiNa. I felt assured after i observed how she treated the old folks there attending to them with passion just like they were her own parents. She even bother to explain to me about dementia people and what to expect. WaiNa is really a Gem the reason why this place gets a four star despite of other unpleasants incidents with other staff nurse.. Nurse Tusal is also quite nice and patience.  Thank you both of you.

reviews.author: Mohd Hasif
reviews.review_text: Staff are friendly and cheerful to everyone. Willing to help with no second thoughts. The food provided is nice

reviews.author: Mala Hermann
reviews.review_text: All the care team, staff nurse Shi Shi, Nurse manager Joyce and palliative doctors took great care of my father while he was in Peaceheaven. They made sure his last days were spent in comfort and minimum pain. MSW Shue ling at Peacehaven is the most exceptional social worker we have experienced in all these years. The kindness and compassion she showed to my father and my family made a world of difference at such a difficult time. She gave us regular updates and all our requests were accomodated with kind understanding. Although I was overseas, she made sure I was there for my father's last breath together with my family via videocall. The skype virtual visits at Peacehaven made it possible for me to see my father everyday. Words can't express our gratitude and thanks to Peacehaven and to their whole team. May god bless you all for the work you do.

reviews.author: Sally Lai
reviews.review_text: The nurses are very attentive and the environment is very conducive for patients to recover !

reviews.review_text: Clean environment, friendly and professional staff. Holistic approach to caring the elderly by engaging them in a variety of activities. Thank you!

name: Orange Valley Active Ageing Centre (Care) @ Alkaff Crescent
display_name: Orange Valley Active Ageing Centre (Care) @ Alkaff Crescent

reviews.author: Randy Lim
reviews.review_text: I was desperately looking for a care centre for my mother in Jan and was so thankful that I chance upon Orange Valley@ Alkaff Crescent. The place is new and the staff are professional. My mom is well taken care of in the Centre and is more cheerful & healthier than before. Thank you very much to the staff of OV.

reviews.author: vanessa yang
reviews.review_text:
I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional care my dad receives at Orange Valley. My dad has Parkinson's, and the staff here have been great. Their caring and attentive approach ensures he always feels comfortable and well-supported.

The variety of activities provide him with both mental and physical stimulation. These activities not only keep him mobile but also assist with his rehabilitation exercises, which have been crucial for his condition. I have seen a significant improvement in his mobility and overall well-being since he started attending.

The time Dad spends at the daycare allows my mum, Grace to recharge and take care of her own needs. We both feel incredibly grateful for the peace of mind knowing he is in such capable and caring hands. Thank you again to the entire team at Orange Valley.

reviews.author: Tan Jin Buck Johnny
reviews.review_text: Very nice environment for the seniors to get together. We can see all the happy faces during the karaoke session. The exercises like Qigong and happy exercises draw many participants enjoying together. The staff are very friendly and encouraging too. Well done, Orange Valley.

reviews.author: Dhilshaadh Balajee
reviews.review_text: OVAAC provides a conducive environment for seniors to keep themselves actively engaged and be able to spend their day meaningfully.

reviews.author: NUR AQILAH BINTI MOHD SALIM
reviews.review_text:
First experience joining there many activities such as Making the balloon
Friendly staff and active company.
Tour to Museum Gallery.
Looking forward to joining the duck tour.There karaoke 🎤 session too .
I can enjoy with my neighbour during my off. Many more awesome things to explore together to fill our free time.

name: NTUC Health Day Centre for Seniors (Heartbeat@Bedok)
display_name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Heartbeat@Bedok (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care)

reviews.author: Lois Setoh
reviews.review_text: My father in law was with NTUC Eldercare for 2.5 years. Nurse Kim and the nursing team have been helpful. It's not easy to care for dementia patients and my father in law praise Nurse Kim's patient care and heart while he was there and has fond memories.

reviews.author: Helen Soh
reviews.review_text:
NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Heartbeat @ Bedok.
We like to extend our deepest gratitude and appreciation to each one of you at the Day Care Centre especially to Ms. Sandy, Nurses - Kim, Franz, April, Drivers - Chester and Heng, CA - Jennifer, Vivien, Jacy and Phyu Phyu . For the delication and extraordinary care provided to our mum Yan Ah Toh. She has changed to a very  cheerful, happy and eagerly looking forward to go to the day care centre every day.

reviews.author: Li Li Chua
reviews.review_text: The staff at Day Care Centre at Heartbeat Bedok are very friendly and helpful towards the seniors. The centre itself is quite spacious and has many activities for the seniors to engage with. The centre supervisor, Mr Chua and manager, Ms Sandy Neo are very knowledgeable and able to handle the seniors with ease. I can see that Ms Sandy is very dedicated and made an effort to talk to and understand my dad's needs. Thank you Ms Sandy and all staff at the centre!

reviews.author: Loh Mei Fong
reviews.review_text:
There was no second thought for our family to place my father who had dementia at NTUC Health Senior Day care located in Bedok Heartbeat few years ago. We were truly impressed with the cosy ambience, clean & well organised environment, the spacious layout and most importantly the warm & friendly staff who attended to us.
Team leader Ms Sandy is very dedicated & professional in responding to any of our concerns we raised.  She will make sure her team do their very best to give the family the assurance & confidence that our loved ones will be  well taken care of. Last but not least, the other staff whom I know of is Nurse Hannah, Centre supervisor Mr Chua & the transport team , are all so helpful , responsible & caring.
Really appreciate & thankful for their kindness & patience given to our loved ones. Managing the centre & taking care of the elderly Is definitely not an easy task,  but they have proven to us a job well done.
Thumbs up to all the staff at NTUC Health Senior Day Care-Heartbeat@Bedok & a Big Thank You on behalf of my family.

reviews.author: Lau Ju Hong
reviews.review_text:
I strongly recommend NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Heartbeat@Bedok (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care), In charge Ms. Sandy, Nurse Ms. Hannah Mr. Chua, Nurse Ms. Kim, Ms. Jasmine, Ms. Linda, Mr. Heng (Transport) and all the staff.
Their passion and patience, thoughtfulness and attentiveness in handling all elderly in the center are beyond words can describe.
My dad is diagnosed with Dementia, we need someone to take care of him during the daytime while I go to work.
We did go to other DC in the East area, but their Environment wasn’t as warm as NTUC DC (Heartbeat). The moment we step into the DC, my dad immediately dislikes and want to go back home
But when we went for pre-entry assessment in DC(Heartbeat), Ms. Sandy, and Nurse Hannah received us, they bought us into a cozy room and serve my dad breakfast and a hot drink (Remember his Smiling face).
When Nurse Hannah did the assessment with my dad, she was so patient with him.
Long story short, 3 months now, he now looking forward to DC every day. The Centre will continually update my dad’s situation and activity.
For family members that looking for Daycare Centre. with Ms. Sandy’s Team, you truly can rest assured your loved ones are well taken care.

Iris Lau

name: NTUC Health Day Centre for Seniors (Serangoon Central)
display_name: NTUC Health Senior Day Care - Serangoon Central (Dementia Care, Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, Day Care)

reviews.author: Zi Heng Wong
reviews.review_text: I have been at NTUC Health Serangoon Central Day Rehab Centre since 2014. They are equipped with a comprehensive range of equipment and facilities which they regularly review so as to remain relevant with the latest technology to best support the range of clients they serve. The staff have been dedicated and demonstrated genuine care and concern to each client beyond just providing therapy services. This personal touch and approach fostered a positive environment which goes beyond just physical aspects, but also mental and social domains which can contribute to much positive outcomes. Overall, a commendable rehabilitation centre that I would recommend.

reviews.author: Carolyn Lee
reviews.review_text:
Thank you, NTUC Team!
A shout-out for all their good work and care.

Thank you, Lilian and Nurse Chong and team...
I really appreciate the professionalism and care and understanding given by the team.
My father wants to thank Rose who is very attentive to him and he feels very loved at the Centre.

I love the updates given by the team too.
It really helps me in my communication with the team.

Although my father is not able to attend the Day Care Centre.
I am looking forward to helping my father to enrol in the Day Care Plus.

Many thanks again, Team!!!!
You have excelled in every way to give my father support, care and encouragement.
And helped my family in journeying together with us.

We wish you all the best and to shine on in our community.

reviews.author: J Tan
reviews.review_text: My mother, who has dementia, attends this daycare centre. I am very grateful for how the daycare staff care for my mom, taking a load off my mind. For example, Claris, who currently serves as the bus escort in the morning, was extremely patient and gentle when my mom forgot where she put her house keys. My thank you's to the daycare staff are not enough to express my gratitude.

reviews.author: Cheow Fong Pang
reviews.review_text: It is never easy taking care of someone and let alone a group of unique individuals in their golden years. Really appreciate the tireless effort, patience, care and passion from the team at the centre in doing such a wonderful job! While taking care of my mother's needs, they also try to find out her interests and constantly engaging her in conversations and various activities. This reflects in her eagerness to go to the centre everyday, always coming home cheery and proud of her own achievements with little pretty artworks. Special thanks to Nurse Chong, Nurse Aide Kathlene, Auntie Winnie, Uncle Lee and Centre Manager Lilian! I am truly inspired and encouraged to also continue my own effort in taking care of my parents.

reviews.author: WENDY KOH
reviews.review_text: My mother has been with NTUC Health GymTonic/Circuit Training Gym since 2019. She enjoys going there for her exercises twice a week. The many exercise stations suit her needs in strengthening her body. The physiotherapists are all very friendly and patient with the old folks. She has made many new friends there at the gym and loves going there to chitchat with them. A good gym for the old folks! Special thanks to the staffs: Sharon, Pearl, Jia Wei, and Colleen. Very patient, approachable and professional in handling members' appointments and queries. Very good experience!
